meaning_str.bing:
n. 爷爷；（外）祖父；外公
网络. 外祖父；祖母；祖先

祖父；外祖父；爷爷；外公；（法律、规则的）豁免条款
不受新规定限制；豁免；使继承先前的权利（或状态）

sogou-CET6.n: 祖父; 外祖父[出现1次)]

sogou-CET4.n: 祖父; 外祖父[出现8次)]

sogou-gaokao.n: 祖父; 外祖父[出现11次)]

sogou-zhongkao.cn: 爷爷; (外)祖父; 外公[出现35次)]

1.en: I just love boxes. My grandfather was sort of the guy who, you know, kind of got me into all sorts of these things.
1.cn: 我的外公是那种，让我对这一切产生兴趣的人。

2.en: "They have names, " answered her grandfather, "and if you can describe one of them to me that I know I will tell you what it is called. "
2.cn: “它们当然有名字了，”爷爷回答，“如果你能向我描述出其中一座山，我就能说出它的名字。”

3.en: Mr. ZHU: (Through Translator) His great-grandfather told him he'd see a eunuch coming out of the Empress Dowager's room carrying a bowl.
3.cn: 朱诚如先生：启光的曾祖父告诉他，他看见一个太监拿着一个碗从慈禧太后的房间中走出。

0.en: My great-grandfather had one huge hit.
0.cn: 我的曾祖父曾名噪一时。

1.cn: 那就是我曾祖父工作的地方。

2.en: Grandfather appeared to me whilst I slept.
2.cn: 我睡着的时候梦见了祖父。

3.en: Well, your grandfather and I might not be here.

4.en: My grandfather had gone into town to buy some Bengay.

5.en: My great-grandfather Ginsburg worked at a greenwich village cafe.
5.cn: 我的曾祖父在格林威治村里的一家咖啡馆工作过。

6.en: It was my grandfather's. You'll need this. And you'll need this.
6.cn: 这是我祖父的，你用得到，你还需要这个。

7.en: And? It turns out my grandfather had died. Oh, my god. that's terrible.
7.cn: 然后呢？结果是我祖父去世了。天呐，那太糟糕了。

8.en: Cousin Kaidu, you forget the mandate Grandfather was handed from heaven.
8.cn: 海都兄弟，你忘了祖父的在天之灵交给我们的任务。

9.en: The Northuldra follow magic, Which means we can never trust them. Grandfather?
9.cn: 诺桑德拉信奉魔法，所以我们永远都不能信任他们。祖父。

10.en: And the Eternal Blue Sky of my grandfather, Genghis Khan, descended from a wolf.
10.cn: 还有我的祖父成吉思汗从一匹狼身上悟到的长生天一样。

11.en: I warned your grandfather of what his greed would summon, but he would not listen.
11.cn: 我警告过你的祖父，他的贪婪必会引来恶果，但他充耳不闻。

12.en: King Runeard, I'm sorry. I don't understand. Grandfather? We bring Arendelle's full guard.
12.cn: 鲁纳德国王，抱歉，我不明白。祖父。我们带上艾伦戴尔的全部护卫。

13.en: I once saw an ink portrait of your grandfather. You are a more striking figure, I must say.
13.cn: 我见过你祖父的水墨画像，不得不说，你看上去比他更引人注目。

14.en: Papá, Mamá. It's him. I know who my great-great-grandfather was. Miguel, get down from there.
14.cn: 爸爸，妈妈，就是他了，我知道我的曾曾祖父是谁了。米格尔，从上面下来。

15.en: I need to get my great-great-grandfather's blessing. You know where I can get a guitar? I know a guy.
15.cn: 但是我需要我曾曾祖父的祝福。你知道哪里可以搞到一把吉他吗？呃，我知道一个人。

16.en: But I wasn't stealing the guitar. Guitar? It was my great-great-grandfather's. He would have wanted me to have it.
16.cn: 但我不是要偷那把吉他。吉他？那是我曾曾祖父的，他肯定也想让我拿走的。

17.en: Great-grandfather Ginsburg was hard to research, because he was never in any of the pictures, because he took them.
17.cn: 从照片里很难找到曾祖父金斯伯格，因为他没有出现在任何一张照片里，他是照相的那个人。

18.en: He's also heir to his grandfather's title for reasons too complicated to bore you with. So it's very neat and tidy.
18.cn: 他还要继承他爷爷的头衔，原因复杂，我就不烦你了，所以很利落。

19.en: Help him what? Help him live. His great grandfather was Jewish. Sometimes it's real hard when you find out your story.
19.cn: 帮他干什么？帮他活下去。他的曾祖父是犹太。有时候发现你自己的故事真的很难。
